name: Star Kid
description:
STAR KID

You're Star Kid, and you're looking for space candies! Use the ARROW KEYS to move, and press the Z KEY to launch starbursts. As you collect the Green Candies, powerups become available. Activate them by pressing the X KEY. Go for a high score!

A game made by let-off studios for the PG Jam, November 2018.

Development:
Game made by let-off studios in about 6 hours.
Game developed in Clickteam Fusion Dev Edition. www.clickteam.com

Sound Effects:
Most made by let-off studios in the BFXR standalone tool. www.bfxr.net
Two sounds made by Atari back in the 80's.

Background Music:
Two tracks from Play On Loop. www.playonloop.com

Visuals:
Graphics by let-off studios.
Font is KARMATIC ARCADE, found on DaFont. www.dafont.com

Contact:
Reach let-off studios via email: editor@let-off.com

Thanks:
Thanks to the Glorious Trainwrecks community. www.glorioustrainwrecks.com
Thanks to Indie Game Jams for posting notice. www.indiegamejams.com
Thanks to Itch.Io for providing a game jam platform. www.itch.io
Thanks to metal drat programing for the PG Game Jam. https://itch.io/jam/pg-game-jam
